trans-unit.source: Represents a control that acts as a container for a collection of selectable child items.
trans-unit.target: 선택 가능한 자식 항목의 컬렉션에 대 한 컨테이너 역할을 하는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The children of this element support the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 요소의 지원의 자식을 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [UI 자동화 클라이언트에 대 한 컨트롤 패턴 매핑](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 이 컨트롤 패턴을 구현 하는 컨트롤의 예제입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 캐시 된 가져옵니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 속성 값이 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 캐시 된 속성 값 해야 이전에 요청에 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> 를 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>속성의 현재 값을 가져올 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 가능한 속성 및 사용에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 캐시 된 포함 된 구조체 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 의 컨트롤 패턴에 대 한 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 요청한 속성이 캐시에 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.CanSelectMultiple*> property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.CanSelectMultiple*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.CanSelectMultiple*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 자동화 공급자 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers> 해당 필드를 사용 해야

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 가져옵니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 속성 값이 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: 이 패턴에서 가져와야는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>와 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>현재 값을 가져오기 위해 참조.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>사용 하 여 가져왔습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>만 캐시 데이터를 포함 하 고 모든 속성의 현재 값을 가져오려고 하면 예외가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Cached%2A>캐시 된 값을 이전에 수행 된 지정 된 속성에 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> 를 사용 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Cached%2A> 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 가능한 속성 및 사용에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 현재 포함 된 구조체 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 의 컨트롤 패턴에 대 한 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event that is raised when a selection in a container has changed significantly and requires sending more addition and removal events than the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit"></xref> constant permits.
trans-unit.target: 컨테이너에서 선택한 항목에 크게 변경 되 고 보다 더 많은 추가 및 제거 이벤트를 전송 해야 할 때 발생 하는 이벤트를 식별 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit"> </xref> 상수가 허용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An invalidated event is raised when a selection in a container has changed significantly and requires sending more addition and removal events than the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit> constant permits.
trans-unit.target: 컨테이너에서 선택한 항목에 크게 변경 되어 보다 더 많은 추가 및 제거 이벤트를 전송 해야 하는 경우 무효화 된 이벤트가 발생 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit>상수가 허용.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 자동화 공급자 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers> 해당 필드를 사용 해야

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.IsSelectionRequired*> property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.IsSelectionRequired*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.IsSelectionRequired*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 자동화 공급자 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers> 해당 필드를 사용 해야

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref> 컨트롤 패턴.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 자동화 공급자 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers> 해당 필드를 사용 해야

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 패턴 식별자에 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> 에서 필요한 컨트롤 패턴을 검색 하</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> 는 등 메서드에 전달 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that gets the selected items in a container.
trans-unit.target: 컨테이너에서 선택한 항목을 가져오는 속성을 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 자동화 공급자 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers> 해당 필드를 사용 해야

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation> <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> 를 사용 하 여 검색 해야 하는 및</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation> 에 나타나지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.
